Acrobats perform feats of agility, balance, and strength. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11 [Acrobat](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3570) **Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 124 **Perception** +6 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +8, [Circus Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +5, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +5, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=45) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +8 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +2 **Int** +1 **Wis** +0 **Cha** +1 **Acrobatic Specialist** For encounters involving contests of acrobatics and similar activities, the acrobat is a 5th-level challenge.
**Steady Balance** When the acrobat rolls a success on an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) check, they get a critical success instead. They aren't off-guard when attempting to [Balance](/Actions.aspx?ID=2369) and can attempt an Acrobatics check instead of a Reflex save to [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2313). **Items** [Climbing Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3) (5), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (50 feet) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +8 **Ref** +11 **Will** +4 **HP** 30 **Cat Fall** The acrobat treats all falls as 25 feet shorter.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** The acrobat is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see; **Effect** The acrobat gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **Melee** foot +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 1d4+4 bludgeoning **Ranged** dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+4 piercing **Sneak Attack** The acrobat deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures. **Swinging Strike** The acrobat swings on a rope or trapeze, moving up to double their Speed. At any point during the swing, they can make a melee Strike.
